channel.title: Nwchem on Jarvist Moore Frost
channel.description: Recent content in Nwchem on Jarvist Moore Frost

item.title: CDFT in NWCHEM
item.description: I’ve been struggling recently to get CDFT jobs to converge in NWCHEM. Rather than continue to play with ~100 heavy-atom structures (of relevance to organic electronic materials) I went to a very simple system of C2H4 / C2F4. This is sometimes studied as a very simple system showing charge transfer. I had many issues getting this job to run successfully, before realising that I needed a suitably diffuse basis set for the constraints to be applicable!
